data.message:
You’re Temporarily Blocked
It looks like you were misusing this feature by going too fast. You’ve been blocked from using it.
Learn more about blocks in the Help Center.
If you think you're seeing this by mistake, please let us know.
just got this message when I tried to comment on a post. anyone have any idea what the heck it means????
'going too fast'????? seriously?????

replies.message: can you tell me what the heck this means?????
Hi Pam.  You can read more about Facebook policies at: http://bit.ly/2fTwNTr. -Joe
Would be nice to have a HUMAN respond and explain what it mean by 'going too fast'!!!
